comments.text: While I agree the tank and especially the mechs need their HP reworked/buffed. The Bastion is coated with medium pen armor, which means it's actually able to tank an almost unlimited amount of machine gun level fire from devastators and fusion gatlings. Your biggest threat is cumulative impacts from Rocket Devastators, Cannon towers, Vox Engine missiles, Hulk cannons and flamethrowers.
comments.author: @bryantan8654

comments.text: Automatons seem way more accurate on their homeworld..
comments.author: @honkderhase8724

comments.text: Re: killing teammates or being killed by teammates due to running under Vox Engines - this is why communication is important. More people need to use comms to let each other know wtf they are doing. With BG, at least all his teammates know what his plan is so he can call shots and organize, but often in random lobbies, people just run off without telling you anything and you don't know if they are trying to full clear maps or just blitz the main objective, or if they want to split up or stay together, and when you ask, they either ignore it, or simply kick you for talking. It's infuriating tbh.
comments.author: @jakemaxwell3810

comments.text: Ragdoll should never be removed imo. How silly will that look when your guy gets hit with a cannon turret to the face, and doesn't even flinch? Or a grenade goes off under your foot and you just say "ow". You are supposed to feel like a skilled (or unskilled) human, not a video game character with clipping turned off.
comments.author: @jakemaxwell3810
